definition[0]: one of the two parts of a bicycle that you push round with your feet to make the bicycle go forward
definition[1]: a part in a car or on a machine that you press with your foot to control it
example[0]: She put her foot down on the accelerator pedal.
definition[2]: a part on a piano or organ that you press with your foot to change the quality of the sound
example[1]: Andrew pedalled up the road towards the town centre.
definition[4]: to turn or push the pedals on a bicycle or other machine with your feet
